alert.note: Alert for Northern Bristol (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 1:22PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Showers with heavy rainfall will impact portions of west central Bristol, southeastern Providence and northwestern Bristol Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 119 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking heavy rainfall over Johnston, moving east at 10 mph. Max rainfall rates of 1 to 1.5 inches per hour are expected with the heaviest rain. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Providence, Cranston, Pawtucket, East Providence, Cumberland, North Providence, Johnston, Attleboro, Smithfield, Lincoln, Central Falls, North Smithfield, Seekonk, Scituate and Glocester. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.
